name: Show Active Purchases for WooCommerce
author: Fuji 9

sections.description:
With this WordPress plugin, users will be able to see which products they have already purchased as they browse your store. When a user comes across a product they’ve already purchased, the “Add to Cart” button will be replaced by a line of text that you can customize in the admin panel. This plugin will also prevent users from purchasing a product they already own.

Let’s use a simple scenario. Let’s say you’re selling 2 subscription types: a basic subscription, and a premium subscription. A user buys the basic subscription. As long as the subscription is active, they won’t be able to buy another basic subscription. Instead, when they see that product on your site, the button will be replaced with custom text that you can set to something like “Already Subscribed” (which again can be customized in the Admin panel).

This is great for preventing members from double subscribing, and it also ensures that you are able to focus their attention on the products the CAN buy.

And, that’s it! It’s that easy.

Support and Feedback

If you run into any issues or bugs, or if you need the plugin to do something it doesn’t, don’t hesitate to reach out to us: support@fuji-9.com. We’re always looking to improve our plugins in any way we can.
sections.installation:
If you want to install the plugin manually

  1. Upload the contents of show-active-purchases-for-woocommerce.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Once it’s active, you can modify your products by following these steps:

  1. In the admin panel, navigate to Settings => Show Active Purchases for WooCommerce
  2. You will see a text field labeled “Button text”. Whatever you type in here will appear on products for users who have already purchased that product.
  3. Leave it blank to show the default “Add to Cart” button and text
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

If you want to install the plugin manually

  1. Upload the contents of show-active-purchases-for-woocommerce.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Once it’s active, you can modify your products by following these steps:

  1. In the admin panel, navigate to Settings => Show Active Purchases for WooCommerce
  2. You will see a text field labeled “Button text”. Whatever you type in here will appear on products for users who have already purchased that product.
  3. Leave it blank to show the default “Add to Cart” button and text

How do I customize the text that displays on products that a user has already purchased?

  1. In the admin panel, navigate to Settings => Show Active Purchases for WooCommerce
  2. You will see a text field labeled “Button text”. Whatever you type in here will appear on products for users who have already purchased that product.
  3. Leave it blank to show the default “Add to Cart” button and text

short_description: A WordPress plugin that allows you to show users which products they own as they browse your shop. Ideal for subscription or membership sites.

screenshots.caption: In the admin panel, you can set the text you want users to see when they browse a product they have already purchased.
For products a user has purchased, they will see your custom text in place of the standard "Add to Cart" button and they will not be able to buy the same product twice.
